name: CCTV Operator
description:
You are CCTV Operator,

Every camera watches a precious chest.

When you detect a suspicious activity, you must send your colleague to zone by pressing corresponding key. 1⃣  2⃣  3⃣  4⃣  5⃣  6⃣  7⃣  8⃣  9⃣

0⃣ to call back.

If 3 of the chests captured, you'll lose!

You can change zoom level by right click.
